title: [Large-scale] Metaverse-based pre-service teacher training program design: Focused on the science discipline

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital platforms and secondary science education experience
context.additional_context: Program for current secondary science teachers to strengthen virtual class design and operation competencies in metaverse environments. Conducted in BYOD settings, with project-based assessments verifying practical applicability

learning_goals: Science-integrated virtual classroom environments can be designed using three or more digital tools on a metaverse platform (e.g., Spatial)
Five or more learner engagement strategies for virtual learning spaces can be identified and applied to real-world scenarios
Reflective practice reports can be written after metaverse-based classes to establish self-evaluation and improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
